The most important thing about clothing is the fitment, and it's tricky sometimes to buy it online. For references, I'm an Asian man, 5'7'', and usually weighed 180 pounds but weigh 155 pounds now (goal is 140 pounds). At 155 pounds and 5'7'' with a 19.5" shoulder and 42" chest (i like it a little loose for comfort), this size medium fit me well. It's slightly a little not too loose by the chest area (i used to work out, hence the broader chest and shoulder), but I'm still shrinking in weight and in time this will fit me perfectly.
